All Classes

Class
Description
Direction16
This enum contains 16 (sixteen) Direction constants that are obtained using the 'getDirection' method.
Direction4
This enum contains 4 (four) Direction constants that are obtained using the 'getDirection' method.
Direction8
This enum contains 8 (eight) Direction constants that are obtained using the 'getDirection' method.
ItemBuilder
 
MessageUtils
This class contains a bunch of methods which make it very easy to translate '&'-based color codes in messages.
MicroLib
This class only functions if MicroLib is installed as a PLUGIN, in the plugins folder of the server, and it must be enabled.
MicroLogger
Logging utility class
MultiMessage
 
MultiMessage.Placeholder
 
OutdatedServerVersionException
This exception should be thrown when a feature in a plugin requires a certain server version, but the server running the plugin isn't running a recent enough Minecraft version to do so.
PlayerMoveFullXYZEvent
 
PlayerMoveListener
 
PlayerMoveXYZEvent
 
QuickTimer
This is a small class useful for timing simple things such as the time required to start-up a plugin or run a command.
Randoms
This class contains a bunch of methods that make it simpler to use random numbers, booleans, and chances.
UpdateChecker
An adapted version of the Update Checker from the SpigotMC.org Wiki.
VersionUtils
This class is used to check the major minecraft version of the server.
VersionUtils.MajorMinecraftVersion
This enum contains all major Minecraft versions (1.6 and newer).
WholeSound
An object that makes it easier to store and play sounds
WholeTitle
An object that makes it easier to store and send titles
YamlConfigFile
This class allows you to easily work with YAML configuration files.
